title: Midlife Halloween Shift
description: I was raised by wolves, but forbidden to be their mate.After an ex-boyfriend warlock put a curse on me,I’m starting to notice scary changes to my body.It could be menopause, or it could be a hex.Going home to the pack on the Halloween holiday,Might be my only way to find answers.Except, he’ll be there. The wolf in sheep’s clothing who broke my heart.The one who ditched this lowlife human, so he could have a shot at being alpha.No big deal. I’ll just avoid him, right?
author: J.L. Wilder
